action.text: SA 1793 fell when SA 1792 was withdrawn.
Amendment SA 1793 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1792 (the instructions of the motion to refer). (consideration: CR S2559, S2584) To add an effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1793 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1792 (the instructions of the motion to refer).
